name: Arcane Dice Wars
description:
Welcome, Transient One . Only you, brought forth from another world, unbound from the Elements and the Arcane Gods, can turn the Wheel of Fate. With the help of loyal servants, strategic deployment, and some lucky dice rolls of course!

Current Release: Version 1.32

Chapters 1-3: Solwel Dungeons, Scattered Forest, Brookhaven City

Recruitable Elite Units: Ruwin the Mighty Arbiter, Lor the Tranquil Sage, Katnir the Cunning Fixer, Samuel the Graceful Oracle

Bond levels currently cap at level 4.  Variant dialogue for player's attributes (Power, Empathy, Logic) are still missing.  

Development began in November 2022.

Created (Writing, Art and Programming) by Jen Lee Quick : wulfmune@gmail.com

I am a full-time working mom.  I was inspired to make this game from my experiences playing Visual Novels, DnD and Mobile Hero Collecting games.  

Music: https://www.purple-planet.com

Music used from https://www.FesliyanStudios.com

free sound effects from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com

sound effects also by Kerry Cobuccio https://www.cobuccio.com/

Engine: https://www.renpy.org/

Special thanks for the Voice Actors:

Koren Livingston

Melody Lutz
